Desc.entry: Works to facilitate the integration of Africans living in Sheffield. Provides advice and information on immigration and asylum, education, health, employment, welfare rights and housing. Runs workshops to promote the relief of poverty, sickness, suffering and distress in Sub-saharan Africa and among African inhabitants of England. Also facilitates the Congo Focus project, which aims to raise awarness of the genocide and human rights abuses occuring in the Democratic Republic of Congo and supports anti-deportation campaigns for Congolese failed asylum seekers.
